Message.Name: shift.bad
Message.Text: She spilled a bucket of something unpleasant all over herself.
She did not like cleaning your house today.

Message.Name: shift.good
Message.Text: She cleaned the building while humming a pleasant tune.
She had a great time working today.

Message.Name: event.sit
Message.Text: ${name} finished her cleaning early, so she just sat around the house.

Message.Name: event.nap
Message.Text: ${name} managed to clean the house before the end of her shift, so she took a nap.
